item.title: Heap
item.description: Heap Heap is a special Tree-based data structure in which tree is a complete binary tree. Heaps are basically are binary trees with more properties and specifications and there are mainly two types of heaps. Rules A heap must be a complete binary tree. All of the levels of the tree must be completely filled except maybe the last one. The last level has all keys as left as possible Types of heap Min Heap
